snippet: Two women allege in a lawsuit that New York City was indifferent to a “pervasive culture” of rape and sexual abuse of female inmates in the city jail.
abstract: Two female inmates at Rikers Island sue correction officer, who they accuse of repeated rape, and New York City, which they say showed indifference to pervasive culture of rape and sexual abuse in jail; name seven other guards as rapists in suit.
lead_paragraph: Two women allege in a lawsuit that New York City was indifferent to a “pervasive culture” of rape and sexual abuse of female inmates in the city jail.

headline.main: 2 Rikers Inmates Accuse Guard of Repeated Rapes
headline.print_headline: 2 Rikers Inmates Accuse Guard of Repeated Rapes
